events.description: I began my coding journey in Secondary School after deciding to take my first Computer Science class and fell in love with the material.
The class was tasked with writing our first project in VB6 - I decided on a Chutes and Ladders variant.
My second HS project in CS2 - Pong (Turing).
Joined Schools Programming Club(learned about OOP).
Enrolled in my current program at Sheridan.
